phases.name: Alpha
phases.description: Working towards feature completeness (bug tracking, time tracking, and orphan ideas)

milestones.name: CLI Operationalization
milestones.description: Ensure the Prism CLI is fully operational and stable in its current state.

objectives.name: Dogfooding the Project
objectives.description: Use the Prism CLI to manage its own development, migrating from DEVPLAN.md.

deliverables.name: Migrate DEVPLAN.md content to Prism CLI
deliverables.description: Transfer the existing development plan from DEVPLAN.md into the Prism CLI's data structure.

actions.name: Migrate 'Alpha' Phase items from DEVPLAN.md
actions.description: Add all milestones, objectives, deliverables, and actions from the 'Alpha' phase in DEVPLAN.md to the Prism project.

actions.name: Verify migrated 'Alpha' Phase items
actions.description: Use 'prism strat show' and 'prism exec show' to verify that all 'Alpha' phase items have been migrated correctly.

deliverables.name: Establish Initial Prism Workflow
deliverables.description: Define and document the initial Git workflow for the Prism project, as described in GEMINI.md.

actions.name: Create BUGS.md for bug tracking
actions.description: Create a BUGS.md file to track bugs and issues, as a temporary measure until the 'prism bug' command is implemented.

actions.name: Create FUTURE_IDEAS.md for orphan ideas
actions.description: Create a FUTURE_IDEAS.md file to track orphan ideas and future enhancements, as a temporary measure until the 'prism idea' command is implemented.

actions.name: Document the Prism workflow in GEMINI.md
actions.description: Add a section to README.md that explains the Git branching and merging strategy, as outlined in GEMINI.md.

deliverables.name: Implement Basic Time Tracking
deliverables.description: Add basic time tracking functionality to the Prism CLI.

actions.name: Add 'in-progress' status
actions.description: Add a new 'in-progress' status to the list of available statuses in the BaseItem model.

actions.name: Implement 'prism time start'
actions.description: Implement a 'prism time start' command that sets the status of the current action to 'in-progress' and records the start time.

actions.name: Implement 'prism time done'
actions.description: Implement a 'prism time done' command that sets the status of the current action to 'completed', records the end time, and displays a list of all completed items.

actions.name: Implement 'prism time next'
actions.description: Implement a 'prism time next' command that functions as a combination of 'prism time done' and 'prism time start'.

objectives.name: Refactor Persistence Layer and Enhance Status Command
objectives.description: Abstract the persistence layer for better modularity and enhance the status command to provide more detailed project insights.

deliverables.name: Abstract Data Store
deliverables.description: Move persistence logic from Tracker to a dedicated DataStore class.

actions.name: Create DataStore class
actions.description: Define the DataStore class in prism/data_store.py with load and save methods.

actions.name: Refactor Tracker to use DataStore
actions.description: Modify Tracker to instantiate and use DataStore for all persistence operations.

actions.name: Update DataStore tests
actions.description: Add or update tests for DataStore class.

deliverables.name: Implement Strategic Item Display
deliverables.description: Modify 'prism status' to show current strategic descriptions (phase, milestone, objective).

actions.name: Identify current strategic items
actions.description: Implement logic in Tracker to identify the current phase, milestone, and objective.

actions.name: Update prism status command
actions.description: Modify the 'prism status' command to display the identified strategic items.

deliverables.name: Implement Completion Percentage Display
deliverables.description: Modify 'prism status' to show completion percentages for deliverables and objectives.

actions.name: Calculate completion percentages
actions.description: Implement logic in Tracker to calculate completion percentages for deliverables and objectives.

actions.name: Update prism status command with percentages
actions.description: Modify the 'prism status' command to display completion percentages.

deliverables.name: Implement Cursor Location Indicator
deliverables.description: Modify 'prism status' to visually indicate the current task cursor location within the execution tree.

actions.name: Identify cursor location
actions.description: Implement logic in Tracker to identify the full path of the cursor location.

actions.name: Update prism status command with cursor indicator
actions.description: Modify the 'prism status' command to visually highlight the cursor's location.

deliverables.name: Refactor Tracker Class Structure
deliverables.description: Break down the large Tracker class into smaller, more focused classes with a core navigation class.

actions.name: Create Core Navigation Class
actions.description: Create a new CoreTracker class focused solely on tree navigation and path resolution.

actions.name: Move Business Logic to Core Class
actions.description: Move tree traversal, path resolution, and navigation logic from Tracker to CoreTracker.

actions.name: Update Tracker to Use Core Class
actions.description: Refactor the Tracker class to delegate navigation and tree operations to the CoreTracker.

deliverables.name: Enhance Error Handling and Validation
deliverables.description: Improve error messages, validation, and add constants for magic numbers.

actions.name: Add Constants for Magic Numbers
actions.description: Define constants for values like slug length limits instead of hardcoding them.

actions.name: Improve Validation Error Messages
actions.description: Enhance validation error messages to be more user-friendly and informative.

actions.name: Add Comprehensive Error Handling
actions.description: Add more robust error handling throughout the codebase with contextual messages.

deliverables.name: Improve Date Handling
deliverables.description: Add support for more flexible date input formats and better date validation.

actions.name: Implement Flexible Date Parsing
actions.description: Add support for multiple date formats in addition to YYYY-MM-DD.

actions.name: Enhance Date Validation
actions.description: Improve date validation with better error messages and range checking.

deliverables.name: Implement Atomic Writes for DataStore
deliverables.description: Add atomic write functionality to the DataStore to prevent data corruption during writes.

actions.name: Research Atomic Write Patterns
actions.description: Investigate atomic write patterns in Python to prevent data corruption.

actions.name: Implement Atomic Write Method
actions.description: Implement a safe atomic write method in the DataStore class using temporary files.

actions.name: Integrate Atomic Writes with Tracker
actions.description: Update the Tracker class to use the atomic write functionality from DataStore.

deliverables.name: Add Comprehensive Unit Tests
deliverables.description: Add more comprehensive unit tests for the refactored classes and new functionality.

actions.name: Create Tests for DataStore Class
actions.description: Write comprehensive unit tests for the DataStore class and its methods.

actions.name: Create Tests for CoreTracker Class
actions.description: Write comprehensive unit tests for the CoreTracker class and its navigation methods.

actions.name: Update Existing Tests for Refactored Code
actions.description: Update existing tests to work with the refactored Tracker and new CoreTracker/DataStore classes.

deliverables.name: Enhance Show Commands with Child Listings
deliverables.description: Improve the strat show and exec show commands to display names/slugs of child items when applicable.

actions.name: Update strat show to Display Children
actions.description: Modify the strat show command to display names/slugs of child items when showing strategic items.

actions.name: Update exec show to Display Children
actions.description: Modify the exec show command to display names/slugs of child items when showing execution items.

actions.name: Ensure Consistent Child Display in JSON Mode
actions.description: Make sure child listings work properly in both regular and JSON output modes for show commands.

deliverables.name: Task System Behavior Fix
deliverables.description: Correct the behavior of task commands: prism task done should only complete current task, prism task next should complete and start next task, and add proper deliverable boundary management.

actions.name: Task logic separation
actions.description: Modify the Tracker class to separate the logic for completing a task from starting a new task.

actions.name: Task done behavior
actions.description: Change prism task done to only complete the current task without starting the next one.

actions.name: Task next behavior
actions.description: Change prism task next to complete current task and then start the next one.

actions.name: Boundary management
actions.description: Implement logic to respect deliverable boundaries and warn when crossing them.

actions.name: Task start behavior
actions.description: Ensure prism task start only starts the next pending task without completing anything.
